label: Introduction
content: This is an example to demonstrate how you can easily use the provided code.

label: Instructions for Developer
content: As a developer, simply copy the code and paste it into your Python IDE.

label: NVIDIA API Key
content: To get a free NVIDIA API key, visit https://build.nvidia.com/explore/discover.

label: Update Directory Path
content: Once you have the API key, you just need to update the directory path to the document you want to analyze.

label: Conclusion
content: and you're all set to start analyzing. Thank you!
